itemDescription: English theatre manager, strolling player and actor

wikipedia_page.main:
Roger Kemble (1 March 1721 – 6 December 1802) was an English
theatre manager, strolling player and actor. In 1753, he married Irish actress Sarah "Sally" Ward (1735–1806) at Cirencester, Gloucestershire, and they had thirteen children, who formed the Kemble family of 19th-century actors and actresses.
